title: Dr. Melinda Williams-Willingham Overview
content: Dr. Melinda Williams-Willingham is a board-certified pediatrician, medical entrepreneur, and real estate investor committed to building generational wealth and leaving a lasting legacy for her family and community.

title: InTouch Pediatrics
content: She is the physician-owner of InTouch Pediatrics, where she has provided exceptional care to Atlanta’s children for nearly 25 years.

title: Education
content: Dr. Willingham holds a B.S. in Microbiology from the University of Alabama and earned her M.D. from Howard University College of Medicine. She completed her pediatric residency at the University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey.

title: Leadership & Advocacy
content: A trusted leader in pediatric advocacy, Dr. Willingham serves as Chair of the Georgia Chapter of the AAP Legislative Committee and recently was appointed Chair of the AAP’s Committee on Federal Government Affairs.

title: Awards & Recognition
content: She has earned numerous accolades including the Pediatric Leadership Alliance Award, Young Physician of the Year, and the AAP Special Achievement and Outstanding Achievement Awards.

title: Board Memberships
content: She has served on the boards of Kids Health First IPA and The Children’s Care Network and remains active in shaping pediatric policy and quality initiatives across Georgia.

title: Real Estate Investing
content: In addition to her medical career, Dr. Willingham is a passionate real estate investor with a growing portfolio focused on medical office buildings and recession-resilient assets.

title: Scaling Real Estate
content: After attending LGA Summit and Zero to Freedom course in March 2020, she and her husband rapidly scaled their real estate holdings.

title: Financial Freedom Education
content: She now uses her knowledge and platform to help others—especially healthcare professionals and communities of color—learn how to unlock financial freedom through real estate.

title: Wealth Philosophy
content: She uses the power of ownership, intentional living, and creating legacy through real estate. Dr. Willingham is a living example of resilience and reinvention.

title: Belief on Wealth
content: She believes wealth is not just about money—it’s about impact. Her life’s work is a reflection of this belief, whether she's healing children, mentoring medical students, or helping others invest in their future.

title: Flourish Beyond Medicine
content: Flourish Beyond Medicine is a transformative 6-week journey designed exclusively for mid-career female physicians ready to pivot, reclaim their time, and create financial freedom.

title: Course Content
content: The course teaches how to shift mindset, optimize calendars, and build new income streams beyond clinical medicine. It is structured for practical wealth-building, time leverage, and career optionality alongside clinical practice.

title: Audience
content: Designed for mid-career physicians who want practical systems—not motivation—to reduce dependence on clinical income and create sustainable growth outside of medicine.

title: Educational Nature
content: The course is educational in nature. It does not provide individualized financial or investment advice. Content is delivered through recorded lessons, frameworks, and applied examples.

title: Masterclass
content: A free live masterclass + Q&A for mid-career female physicians ready to move beyond burnout, bureaucracy, and the endless patient grind and start creating real freedom, wealth, and purpose.

title: Event Details
content: February 25th, 2026, at 7:00 PM EST. Host: Dr. Melinda Willingham (Physician, Mentor & Founder).

title: Lead Magnet
content: Registration includes an instant bonus: The Physician’s Legacy Wealth Blueprint™ (a step-by-step wealth/freedom guide).

title: Three Pillars
content: Mindset - Breaking the doctor identity trap, Time - Reclaiming schedules and sanity, Wealth - Building income independent of clinic hours.

title: Who This Is For
content: Mid-career physicians craving freedom, financially stable but not financially free, high-achievers wanting income that reflects their purpose, and those ready to flourish.

title: Final Call to Registration
content: Seats are limited for this free live session! Registration secures instant access to the Wealth Blueprint upon confirmation.

title: Footer & Waitlist
content: Footer Links: Store, Library, Blog. Waitlist Promotion: Join to receive clarity on the next chapter, simple shifts for freedom, and real success stories from other physicians.
